short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to schedule clanmeeting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Schedule your Clan Meeting and keep it synchronized with your Google or Outlook 365 Calendar with this extension!

The Clan Meeting chrome extension allows you to schedule and join meetings within your own calendar and provides the ability to:

Set your meeting link as the meeting location
Automatically include all call-in details and URLs
Invite attendees from your contact list
Allow participants to join with just one click

Clan Meeting is a solution which provides below features to the users and the extension will help users to send calendar invites to join to this application.

* Ability to share the screen with all the other participants
* Video recording support
* Live streaming to YouTube
* Secure, password-protected rooms
* High quality audio and video with a low bandwidth mode
* A browser experience that enables all participants to join with a single click of the meeting URL
* Android and iOS apps
